nodes.text: The Model CR-24 flame rifle was an incendiary weapon produced by Merr-Sonn Munitions, Inc.. Its Czerka counterpart was known as the CZ-24 Flamemaster flame rifle. The rifle had a fire range of 10 meters which meant the CR-24 was better utilized for close combat.
A larger military version of the Model C-22 flame carbine, the CR-24 was likewise a popular choice among Corporate Sector forces.
